name: NSWindowTab
desc: A tab associated with a window that is part of a tabbing group.

items.name: var title: String!
items.desc: The title for the window tab.

items.name: var attributedTitle: NSAttributedString?
items.desc: The title for the window tab, specified as an attributed string.

items.name: var toolTip: String!
items.desc: The tooltip for this window tab.

items.name: var accessoryView: NSView?
items.desc: An optional accessory view for the tab.
